title: What is complexity and what is a complex system? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a friend who discusses complex systems in his book Amazon.com: Second Order Project Management (Advances in Project Management) (9781409410942): Michael Cavanagh: Books and on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/user/complexpm which might be of some help. There is also the excellent work by Peter Checkland on this Includes a 30 Year Retrospective: Amazon.co.uk: Peter Checkland: 9780471986065: Books
These questions already exist on Quora, see answers here: What is a complex system? What is complexity?
